item.title: CVE-2021-24597|2024-08-03T19:35:20.208Z -- unknown -- %E6%9C%89%E8%B5%8F%20you%20shang
item.description: The You Shang WordPress plugin through 1.0.1 does not escape its qrcode links settings, which result into Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues in frontend posts and the plugins settings page depending on the payload used
